A look at Raspmbc video streaming

The Raspberry Pi Foundation described the pi as "The Raspberry Pi is a credit-card sized computer that plugs into your TV and a keyboard. It’s a capable little PC which can be used for many of the things that your desktop PC does, like spreadsheets, word-processing and games. It also plays high-definition video.". This post is to assist in setting up your Raspberri Pi With an XMBC build called Raspmbc.… Continued
